EmailTemplate.name: 16.ComColl.SessionBC.none.D.G.E.2426.Email 9 - In-browser Comms
EmailTemplate.subject: Enabling in-browser communications with Nokia SBC for cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Migrating SBCs to the Cloud In-browser contextual communications
In-browser communications extend VoLTE multi-device services to web browsers, providing a feature-rich, contextual, second-screen mobile experience that integrates seamlessly with any web application or business process.
Check out our new video and brochure to understand how Nokia SBC, with built-in cloud, WebRTC and API technologies, enables the rapid introduction of new IMS-based services. Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Communications and Collaboration Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
